description: This data comes from the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency and is reported annually beginning in 2003. It includes data for New Orleans and several benchmark cities, including: Atlanta, Baton Rouge, Louisville, Memphis, Miami, Nashville, Oklahoma City, Raleigh, and Tampa.

name: Certified Green Buildings (2005 - Present)
